ref.full: Malham, I. B.; Letellier, P.; Mayaffre, A.; Turmine, M. (2007) J. Chem. Thermodyn. 39, 1132-1143.
ref.title: Part I: Thermodynamic analysis of volumetric properties of concentrated aqueous solutions of 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium tetrafluoroborate, 1-butyl-2,3-dimethylimidazolium tetrafluoroborate, and ethylammonium nitrate based on pseudo-lattice theory
